choose.otherwise: select count(*) from board where title like '%${_parameter}%' or contents like '%${_parameter}%'

mapper.select: select b.no as no, b.title as title, b.contents as contents, a.name as userName, b.hit as hit, b.g_no as groupNo, b.o_no as orderNo, b.depth as depth, date_format(b.reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as regDate, b.user_no as userNo from user a, board b where a.no = b.user_no order by b.g_no desc, b.o_no asc;
